name: Can A Cute Ghost Story Be Spooky?
name_original: Can A Cute Ghost Story Be Spooky?
description:
DESCRIPTION: 

In a quiet cemetery there is a house haunted by a ghost called Jimmy. Jimmy likes to eat pizza and be happy all the time! But one night something terrible happened... his favorite hat was stolen! Jimmy is so sad now... help him get his hat back!
